Event card items checklist:

- [ ] Date and time of starting
- [ ] Short description
- [ ] Meetup link
- [ ] Google calendar link
- [ ] meet.google or meet.jit.si link
- [ ] Github link if applicable


Event announcement checklist:

- [ ] meetup
- [ ] linkedin
- [ ] twitter
- [ ] telegram
- [ ] mailing list
